name: superstring
description: A data structure to efficiently represent the results of applying patches.

scripts.build:browser: bash -c script/build-browser-version.sh || echo 'the browser build is unsupported'
scripts.test:browser: cross-env SUPERSTRING_USE_BROWSER_VERSION=1 mocha test/js/*.js || echo 'the browser tests are unsupported'
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:native && npm run test:browser
scripts.prepublishOnly: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm run build

author: Nathan Sobo <nathan@github.com>
